solution_line_template: So far Alex and Max are running the race for {initial_even_distance} + {alex_ahead_1} + {max_ahead_1} + {alex_ahead_2} = <<{initial_even_distance}+{alex_ahead_1}+{max_ahead_1}+{alex_ahead_2}={total_distance_covered}>>{total_distance_covered} feet.

If the road they're racing each other on is {total_road_length} feet long, {total_road_length} - {total_distance_covered} feet = <<{total_road_length}-{total_distance_covered}={remaining_distance}>>{remaining_distance} feet left for Max to catch up to Alex.
